about_the_game:
Blossoming Ruins is a cozy idle city-builder and colony simulator designed to quietly grow at the bottom of your screen while you go about your day, rebuilding a kingdom from the ruins of war.

Rebuild your kingdom:

Restore structures, reclaim land, and bring life back to your war-torn realm. Watch as your kingdom evolves from crumbled ruins into a vibrant haven, step by step. Unlock new buildings and upgrades as you progress, from quaint cottages to grand halls, ensuring your kingdom thrives.

Villager activities:

Recruit villagers to handle tasks such as gathering resources, constructing buildings, and tending to the land. As they perform these duties, their skills will naturally improve, ensuring your kingdom runs smoothly.

Automate with magic:

Utilize various magical tools to automate your kingdom further, from placing portals that connect resources to your base, to employing magical creatures that assist your villagers and streamline tasks.

Customize and decorate:

Personalize your kingdom by adjusting the appearance of buildings, villagers, and the environment. Add extra elements like flowers and pets that roam your land. Tailor every detail to make it truly your own.

Multitasking and accessibility:

Blossoming Ruins seamlessly integrates into your daily life by resting at the bottom of your screen, letting you tend to other activities while your kingdom develops. Adjust the view by zooming, or switch to vertical to meet your needs. The game naturally works for all screen sizes, the wider the screen the more of your kingdom can potentially see at once!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 @ 3.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Reclaim your land in this cozy idle kingdom simulator that quietly grows at the bottom of your screen as you go about your day. With 'The Great War' behind you, lead your villagers into an era of peace and prosperity, cultivating crops and rebuilding from the ruins.
